name: Settings Panel Tour
description: Learn about the settings panel and its features

steps.title: Settings Panel Overview
steps.description: The settings panel contains three important sections: Settings, Pages, and Components. Let's explore each one!

steps.title: Settings Tab
steps.description: Click here to access general settings, site styling, domains, and other configuration options for your website.

steps.title: Settings Options
steps.description: Here you can configure site colors, fonts, SEO settings, and more. Each option helps customize your website's appearance and behavior.

steps.title: Pages Tab
steps.description: Click here to manage your website pages - add new pages, edit existing ones, and organize your site structure.

steps.title: Page Management
steps.description: Create, edit, and organize your website pages here. You can set page titles, URLs, and manage the navigation structure.

steps.title: Design Editor Tab
steps.description: Click here to access the component library - drag and drop elements like text, images, buttons, and more onto your pages.

steps.title: Design Editor
steps.description: Browse through various components you can add to your pages. Simply drag any component onto your canvas to start building!

steps.title: Great Job!
steps.description: You now know how to navigate the settings panel. Use these tools to customize your website exactly how you want it!

completionMessage: You've completed the settings panel tour! Start exploring these features to build your perfect website.
